column4: or sorry to be such a newb anyone installed ndis wrapper before.. getting fustrated.. the website gives an exe for my card.. where can u get just the drivers.. or how do i get them :(
anyone got any insignt ? to my problem
or sorry to be such a newb anyone installed ndis wrapper before.. getting fustrated.. the website gives an exe for my card.. where can u get just the drivers.. or how do i get them :(
the .inf file is in the exe. If you're lucky, you can extract this exe with unzip or cabextract. If you're unlucky, going to have to search for the .inf itself.
